actions.name: Backup
actions.description: Grants permission to start a backup job for an existing file system

actions.name: ClientMount
actions.description: Grants permission to allow an NFS client read-access to a file system

actions.name: ClientRootAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to allow an NFS client root-access to a file system

actions.name: ClientWrite
actions.description: Grants permission to allow an NFS client write-access to a file system

actions.name: CreateAccessPoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create an access point for the specified file system

actions.name: CreateFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty file system

actions.name: CreateMountTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to create a mount target for a file system

actions.name: CreateReplicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new replication configuration

actions.name: CreateTags
actions.description: Grants permission to create or overwrite tags associated with a file system; deprecated, see TagResource

actions.name: DeleteAccessPoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified access point

actions.name: DeleteFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a file system, permanently severing access to its contents

actions.name: DeleteFileSystemPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the resource-level policy for a file system

actions.name: DeleteMountTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified mount target

actions.name: DeleteReplicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a replication configuration

actions.name: DeleteTags
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified tags from a file system; deprecated, see UntagResource

actions.name: DescribeAccessPoints
actions.description: Grants permission to view the descriptions of Amazon EFS access points

actions.name: DescribeAccountPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to view the account preferences in effect for an account

actions.name: DescribeBackupPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to view the BackupPolicy object for an Amazon EFS file system

actions.name: DescribeFileSystemPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to view the resource-level policy for an Amazon EFS file system

actions.name: DescribeFileSystems
actions.description: Grants permission to view the description of an Amazon EFS file system specified by file system CreationToken or FileSystemId; or to view the description of all file systems owned by the caller's AWS account in the AWS region of the endpoint that is being called

actions.name: DescribeLifecycleConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to view the LifecycleConfiguration object for an Amazon EFS file system

actions.name: DescribeMountTargetSecurityGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to view the security groups in effect for a mount target

actions.name: DescribeMountTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to view the descriptions of all mount targets, or a specific mount target, for a file system

actions.name: DescribeReplicationConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to view the description of an Amazon EFS replication configuration specified by FileSystemId; or to view the description of all replication configurations owned by the caller's AWS account in the AWS region of the endpoint that is being called

actions.name: DescribeTags
actions.description: Grants permission to view the tags associated with a file system

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to view the tags associated with the specified Amazon EFS resource

actions.name: ModifyMountTargetSecurityGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the set of security groups in effect for a mount target

actions.name: PutAccountPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to set the account preferences of an account

actions.name: PutBackupPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable automatic backups with AWS Backup by creating a new BackupPolicy object

actions.name: PutFileSystemPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to apply a resource-level policy that defines the actions allowed or denied from given actors for the specified file system

actions.name: PutLifecycleConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to enable lifecycle management by creating a new LifecycleConfiguration object

actions.name: Restore
actions.description: Grants permission to start a restore job for a backup of a file system

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to create or overwrite tags associated with the specified Amazon EFS resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified tags from an Amazon EFS resource

actions.name: UpdateFileSystem
actions.description: Grants permission to update the throughput mode or the amount of provisioned throughput of an existing file system
